title: Fabulous Artist Loft with Common Outdoor Space - Pets OK
description:
Available early July:
Welcome to 109 W Wildey St #PH07! The Schoolhouse Lofts are a community of modern-industrial artist lofts inside the historic Daniel Boone School in the Northern Liberties area of Philadelphia. This beautiful, late gothic revival building was classically known as the Philadelphia school for the rebellious. This building brings a unique mix of old and new with trendy design elements like minimalistic lighting fixtures, exposed beams, original brick work, and fantastically intricate original details. Unit #PH07 is a lofted 1 bedroom / 1 bathroom apartment on the top floor of the building. Enter into a hallway that opens into the common area with high ceilings, large windows, hardwood floors, and plenty of space for different living room and dining room layouts. The kitchen is in the center and boasts ample cabinet & prep space, built-in microwave, gas range, and fridge. Directly behind the kitchen is your full bathroom offering tile flooring, a vanity, and a shower / tub combo. Continue past the bathroom to a bonus area which would work well as an office space, den, or workout area. The lofted bedroom is carpeted and has a double-door closet. The building also features a brand new elevator and there are FREE laundry rooms on the 1st floor, 2nd floor, and Penthouse floor. Schedule your tour today!

Welcome to 1409 S Taylor St! This gorgeous 3 bedroom / 2 bathroom row home features hardwood floors, recessed lighting, in-unit laundry, outdoor space, and more! Enter into the living area with blue walls and a lovely wallpapered accent wall. Your finished basement is accessible from the kitchen and is equipped with hardwood floors and a washer / dryer in a closet. There is a small room towards the back and a full bathroom boasting vanity, round mirror, and marble tiled shower / tub combo. This great space won’t last long – schedule your tour today!

Welcome to 1234 N Taney St #C! This fantastic 1 bedroom / 1 bathroom apartment is located in Brewery Row, an apartment community in Philadelphia’s lovely Brewerytown neighborhood. Your full bathroom has a tiled shower/tub combo and vanity with additional storage space. Head into the large bedroom to view 3 windows offering tons of sunlight and two closets with sliding doors. title: Uniquely spacious three bedroom home for rent
description: This is a well cared for 3 bedroom 2 full bath single rancher with finished basement and garage.  Enter the property to find a spacious living room with large bow window providing tons of natural light. The living room opens to the dining area which has a large window overlooking the rear patio. The property is situated on a nice size lot with a rear yard providing a covered cement patio and plenty of lawn space to enjoy.

Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: Street level apartment in Beautiful Neighborhood with New Bathroom, Beautiful Ne
description:
The apartment is a street level basement apartment. This there are no steps down into the apartment, you just walk right in. The apartment has a kitchen living room with a large window. Then there is a long hallway with 5 closets that connects to the bathroom and bedroom. Bedroom has a window and closet too.
Washer and Dryer in building.
This is in the heart of University City, close to Mariposa Food CoOp, Gold Standard Cafe, Dock Street Brewery, Clark Park and Cedar Park, and much, much more.
We do a $50 background check fee. To begin the background check, we would need to have one month’s rent plus the $50 background fee. The background check is done by a company named National Tenant Network.
There is a $100 utility fee too.
Phone interviews first before touring.
For the safety of everyone, mask must be warn when touring the property and hand sanitizer.
Background checks are done with National Tenant Network for all candidates. There is a security deposit and background check fee.
Sorry for all the inconvenience but this is for everyone’s safety. No calls before 9 am or after 5 pm.
Mike

title: One Bedroom In Haverford
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. title: The opportunity of 2022! Phenomenal 3 bed 3 bath bi-level + ROOF DECK!
description:
3108 Clifford St #2 - Immaculate 3 bed 3 bath bi-level apt with wonderful rooftop deck, W/D, C/A & more!
Basking in the shimmer of natural lighting, this expansive contemporary 3 bed 3 bath bi-level apt with impeccable amenities on the outskirts of Brewerytown is the perfect opportunity to upgrade your lifestyle! Walk up into an open floor plan with hardwood flooring, delighted by a ton of natural lighting the living room and kitchen sit in synchronicity whilst a balcony sits off to the side beyond sliding glass doors. The beautifully appointed kitchen impresses with with quartz countertops, sleek white cabinetry, a breakfast bar and stainless-steel appliances including: a refrigerator, microwave, gas stove, dishwasher--which create an ideal setting for meal preparation. Just beyond the kitchen is the laundry room with an incredible stacked washer dryer combo. A full bathroom with a bathtub sits next to the first generously spacious bedroom at the front of the unit.
Two super spacious bedrooms sit on opposite ends of the second level, each with closets, ample natural light and more than enough space to fit a king sized bed and then some. The rear bedroom is connected to an incredible ensuite bathroom with an illuminated LED mirror and bathtub. The third full bathroom sits next to the front bedroom. And up another flight of stairs behind door number 3, is an incredible opportunity where you can watch the sunrise over the skyline or r gaze at the starlit night from your very own private & totally expansive rooftop deck.

Very spacious bedrooms
Central Air/Heat
Washer & Dryer
Balcony
Rooftop deck
Hardwood flooring
New building

title: New fitness center, Beautiful courtyards, On site washer and dryer
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: Uniquely maintained three bedroom home for rent
description: Beautiful stone front  rancher twin  home in Bell's Corner that has been updated throughout and is move-in ready. Walk up to a nice size, white picket fenced front yard, with a nice size stone patio for outside entertaining.  Enter the home walking into a nice size living room with vaulted ceilings,  beautiful newer Pergo embossed laminate floors and a newer extra large prairie style Bay window for lots of natural sunlight. There is a nice size dining area off the living room with nice lighting fixtures and a chair rail.  The kitchen has been updated with white cabinets and newer Stainless Steel appliances; Refrigerator, Dishwasher and five burner  Stove. There is lots of cabinet space, a lazy susan, butcher block counter top, recessed lights and a wooden ceiling for old time country charm.   The house has been freshly painted throughout.   There are three nice size bedrooms on the first floor level.  The master bedroom has a private bath with a shower stall.  The main hall full bath has been completely remodeled new fixtures and with beautiful tile work.  There are nice size closets throughout! Downstairs there is a big,  fully finished basement with neutral beige carpeting, brown paneling with crown molding and another newly renovated beautiful bathroom. There is a full oversized laundry room for additional storage or space that could easily be converted into another room. There is a door in the laundry room which leads to the back driveway and garage access.  There is a full garage.
